attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Military Training
I propose that young offenders found guilty of serious crime should be seconded to a Military Unit for corrective training. There are many units spread throughout the UK and most are under used.The infrastructure is alrady in place. They should do Basic Military Training to include Trade Training but not of subjects connected to Warfare. They must be subject to Military Law and Restriction are to be in place at night and during the day. A small wage should be paid to assist with their requirements and ability to socialise with others.Period of stay should be defined by the courts and the Commanding Officer is to be fully responsible and accountable for the duration of their stay.
